QuestData.Title: Slave Hunters
QuestData.Description: Anytime a gladiator escapes Stonemaul, they send their hardened slave hunters after us.$b$bI consider myself a capable warrior, years of surviving in an arena have taught me that.$b$bBut these slave hunters keep pendants magically tethered to the slaves. With these pendants they can track us down anywhere we go, and kill us in our sleep or when our guard is down.$b$bI have no right to ask this, but can you enter Stonemaul and retrieve these pendants?
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the Pendants of Brol, Krag, and Mol.
QuestData.RewardText: You have shown more honor in this one act than I have seen in many years.$b$bWhen this is over, I will swear my axe to your forces and pass my knowledge on to your troops.
